alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 9:03PM PST until December 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...MOUNTAIN SNOW VALLEY RAIN AND SNOW CONTINUE OVERNIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 5 inches. * WHERE...Oakesdale, Cheney, Rockford, Tekoa, Worley, La Crosse, Coeur d`Alene, Post Falls, Potlatch, Hayden, Genesee, Pullman, Davenport, Rosalia, Airway Heights, Uniontown, Spokane Valley, Colfax, Fairfield, Moscow, Plummer, and Downtown Spokane. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
